title: Gross rant from a guru know in this forum, saying vaccine is killing more than covid
cleaned_text:
"It's going to be mandatory there's no doubt about it"

It's sentences like this that are problematic, because by lending your imaginative energy to such feelings you run the risk of bringing it into manifestation.

So if his position is that "he does not want such things to be mandatory" then he shouldn't be using sentences such as "It's going to be mandatory there's no doubt about it".

It's an easy mistake for a non-spiritual conspiracy theorist, but a spiritual guru should know better.

Otherwise, it's just black magic.
